actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to establish a select committee on population.

summary.text: Creates a Select House Committee on Population to conduct an investigation and study of: (1) the major adverse effects of current population growth throughout the world; (2) approaches which have shown to be effective in coping with excessive population growth; and (3) means to encourage countries with excessive population growth rates to adopt methods proven to be successful in reducing population growth rates.

titles.title: A resolution to establish a select committee on population.
